title: In search, and need, of this font!
tags: Could somebody please tell me what font this is. Thanks in advance! what font
content:
Hi all!

This is my first visit and your help would be much appreciated! I was on the website of houseandgarden and found their font so simple and nice to work with. However, I could not identify the font on several websites. I am hoping one of you knows what font this is!

[http://www.houseandgarden.co.uk/interiors/hipster-home-trends/washi-tape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416140304/http:/www.houseandgarden.co.uk/interiors/hipster-home-trends/washi-tape "http://www.houseandgarden.co.uk/interiors/hipster-home-trends/washi-tape")

I am not sure if the text "20 HIPSTER HOME TRENDS WE LOVE" and the text below the image "The £3 magic decorating tape from Japan. If you're a hipster, you use it to create your moodboard - you know, " are the same... But I want to know :)

Thanks a lot.
author: daynaj

comments.content: This needs to be moved to Font ID area for an answer.

"20 HIPSTER HOME TRENDS WE LOVE"  
Proxima Nova Alternate Extra Condensed by Mark Simonson Studio (2005)  
Size: 36px  
Weight: 600  
Style: Normal

"The £3 magic decorating tape.... "  
FF Tisa Web Pro by Mitja Miklavčič (2008)  
Size: 19px  
Weight: 400  
Style: Normal

Please only ask for and provide font IDs here:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416140304/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

hhp
